code: @Override public void setAsText(String text) throws IllegalArgumentException {     if (StringUtils.hasText(text)) {         setValue(ClassUtils.resolveClassName(text.trim(), this.classLoader)).     } else {         setValue(null).     } }
@Override public String getAsText() {     Class<?> clazz = (Class<?>) getValue().     if (clazz != null) {         return ClassUtils.getQualifiedName(clazz).     } else {         return "".     } }
